code: export var TOKEN_KEY="@jwt-Token";export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY)!==null;};export var getToken=function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);};export var login=function login(token){token=token.replace("Bearer ","");localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);};export var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);};
